title: Start
body:
Hi Vincent!
[[Hi Twinky|#1]]
[[<<Inventory.Has(Forget-me-not)>>Hi, I think i found an answer to your riddle!|#11]]

You are looking for the star too, aren`t you? Any luck yet?
[[Not really.|#2]]

I've actually already searched the surroundings and still haven't find it. I believe the star is hidden somewhere in the green
[[Oh. I wish you luck with that|#3]]
[[What if it actually fell very far away from our forest?|#4]]
[[What if someone has already found it, but just didn't tell anyone?|#5]]

Best luck to you too. I don't really know what kind of wish you would make, but I bet it'be good
[[Thanks. Can I ask you about your wish?|#6]]

It might have, I think. But birds claim to have seen it landing somewhere around, and they see higher than we do.
[[That makes sense. Can I ask you what wish would you make?|#6]]

It bothers me too, to be honest. We can't be sure it hasn't happened, but let's hope that even if it has, the person who found it is nice.
[[I guess. Can i ask you what wish would you make?|#6]]

Oh, it's not big deal really. I tried to come up with something great, influential and important; but I have already got pretty much everything I need to be happy.
[[...|#7]]

There is this one thing that has been bothering me for a very long time - it's a riddle I heard once, and it goes like this:
[[...|#8]]

"A young lad was leaving his loved one, he found her a flower to give. He said "it'll make you remember, because it has magic in it.""
[[...|#9]]

I made me so curious about the answer that I still wonder! What kind of flower has magic in it to make you remember? That sounds so bizarre 
[[It does indeed|#10]]
I really wish i'd found the answer to that. Anyway, I gotta keep looking. Bye then!

You really mean it? That's so great!
[[It's forget-me-nots, the flowers|#12]]

Oh, I'm surprised it turned out to be that simple, really. Thank you so much for telling me!
[[No problem|#13]]

I'd like to thank you with a gift. There is a jar of jam in my house, you can have it, it's delicious. If you happen to see anything else that you need - feel free to borrow, i don't mind
[[Thank you|#14]]
